content.caption: 🌟 Ready to level up your professional game? 🚀 Swipe through for our top tips to boost productivity, enhance your skills, and find that perfect work-life balance! 💼✨ Don't forget to share your favorite tip in the comments below! #WorkSmart #CareerGoals

avatar_data.prompt: A realistic portrait photo of a 25-35 year old person, friendly, professional, engaging personality, professional headshot quality, studio lighting, high resolution, photorealistic, detailed facial features, natural expression, suitable for social media profile, modern style

content.media_prompt: A tips social media post image, featuring the same person from the avatar, related to: 🌟 Ready to level up your professional game? 🚀 Swipe through for our top tips to boost productivity, , high quality, professional, Instagram-worthy, bright and engaging, modern aesthetic
